pullrequest.title: View Transparent and View Wireframe options to object menu

content.raw:
cool! One thing I noticed is that on desktop it is clear that the wireframe and transparent modes can be active at the same time since there are check boxes to indicate this. But on a mobile device, I forgot about it and was trying a few times to switch from wireframe to transparent mode without noticing any change. 

I can think of two ways to resolve this. 

1) Make wireframe/transparent menu highlighted on mobile devices to indicate the mode is enabled,

2) make them exclusive so only one mode can be on at once.
